xwikidoc.content: ### Home page ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=App Within Minutes ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.description=Create collaborative web applications within minutes, based on XWiki's powerful structured data management system. platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=Crear Aplicación platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=Aplicaciones platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.space=Nombre de aplicación platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=Ultimo autor platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=Fecha de actualización platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=Acciones ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=Grant space administration rights. ### AWM Applications panel entry platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=Crea tu propio! ### Wizard step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=Step {0} \u2014 {1} appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=Nombre ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=Name your application ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=Choose the application name appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=Estructura ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=Structure your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=Describe the application data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=Entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=Locate your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=Choose where to store the data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=Presentación ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=Customize your application home page ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=Customize the application home page platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=Siguiente Paso platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=Ir al siguiente paso platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=Terminar ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=Go to the application home page platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=Paso Anterior platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=Ir al paso anterior platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=Pasos ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=This wizard will guide you through the process of creating an application. These are the steps you'll take: ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where the application will be created. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=The parent of the new application. Leave this field empty if you want to create a top level application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=Path.To.Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=Code ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=This is the place where the application code is located. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=The hidden pages are also listed, even though your current user profile settings prevent to do so, otherwise none of the application code pages would be visible because they are all hidden by default. platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=Crear Aplicación platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=Nombre de la Aplicación ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=The application name determines the homepage URL and the location where the application code is stored. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=Application homepage URL ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=Application code location ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=This application already exists. If you go to the next step you will be editing the existing application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=Please enter the application name. ### Wizard Step 2: Application
